name: Noncore Solutions
overview: Noncore Solutions was established in 2010 providing a sophisticated and highly-automated outbound dialing solution that helps contact centers deliver world class customer service by maintaining the appropriate connectivity levels and best-inbreed call detection methodology. Noncore reduces the complexities involved in multi-site and multichannel contact centers. Our solution delivers tremendous costs savings. By utilizing our enterprise outbound architecture; there is no need for expensive telephony infrastructure and reoccurring maintenance costs. Your Call Center, Our Infrastructure. Itâ€™s that easy to get started with Noncore, equip your agents with a computer, high speed internet connection and a headset and Noncore will ensure the rest is in place. Immediately your organization will see improved operational efficiency, increased agent productivity and definite cost savings.
